name: Polymera
description:
Welcome to the Sepura Valley

The Polymera Corporation has been in business for 105 years, acting with increasingly reckless abandon, searching for more and more ore, minerals and oil for their projects, recently with aggressive mining robots. While protests have been staged against them since the beginning, somehow they always get the upper hand. 

You are a passionate biologist in the Sepura Basin. This valley is full of interesting and somewhat aggressive plant life. Will you stand in their way? With your cunning use of plant hybridization and hydroponics, you may succeed! 


How to play

Set up plants along the path to defend the valley,  combine plants together and even upgrade them with robotic parts to improve your defenses against increasingly strong enemies. 

Use different combinations and placements to strategically take down the enemy. But be careful, the robots will try to uproot your plants as part of their mission! 

The fate of the Sepura Basin is in your hands
